byline.original: By BEN PROTESS, MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and SUSANNE CRAIG

abstract: Regulators have discovered that hundreds of millions of dollars in customer money have gone missing from MF Global, the brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine.
snippet: Regulators have discovered that hundreds of millions of dollars in customer money have gone missing from MF Global, the brokerage firm run by Jon S. Corzine.

headline.main: Regulators Investigating MF Global for Missing Money
headline.print_headline: Corzine-Led Firm is Said to be Eyed on Missing Funds
